name: CUBEs (itch) (Pro19)
description:
This is a 3D platformer game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2018.  This is a simple platformer with a twist. Try to complete the levels to uncover the story and shed light on the truth about your own reality.

SOME ADVICE-

  1. Open and read the instructions in the game menu.
  2. Try to feel the controls.
  3. This will be a frustrating experience. Don't get frustrated (lol).
  4. Keep trying and have fun!!

CREDITS-

The game was made by me (Pranshu Mishra) except the music. I called my two good friends for help and they gladly agreed!!

Music - Farhad Bharucha and Surbhi Agarwal.

Font - Baby Blocks by Colorful Typhoon (www.dafont.com)

BUGS-

I have played the game quite a few times and i found no issues. Yet, if you find anything, please do inform me.

NOTES-

I have provided a link to the github repository where my source code is. The source code contains many unused scenes and assets which i used while developing the game for reference point of view. These assets were not used in the final build of the game.

I do not own or have the rights to the materials found here as mine except for the ones i made.
